 “A video is worth 1.8 million words.” – Dr. James McQuivey

A lot of people know us as the best web developers in Toronto, but many of them don’t know that we provide drone photography as well. As a Toronto web-design company, we’ve noticed that a large number of the websites we’ve worked on were using old, low quality, stock images of the Toronto skyline. These images were getting recycled and were being used by almost everyone. We decided to solve this issue by providing our very own drone video service. We are currently developing a comprehensive catalogue of footage all across Toronto exclusively for our clients. Our service will be available by next month and all of our recordings will be in 4K HD resolution and shot with a DGI Phantom 3 Professional drone. We will be licensing these original 15-30 second videos for $100 dollars each, and I will be shooting the aerial drone footage personally.

“Online retailer Living Direct found that videos boosted conversion as well as increasing time on site by 9%.” – Internet Retailer, 2010

Putting videos on your website will make people view your webpage longer, it will retain their attention, and give them a better overall experience. These things will give a better impression of your company, and help you convert page views in to actual customers.

In fact, Influencing someone to stay on your website for longer periods of time will actually improve your SEO, this is because Google looks at how long someone has spent on a website to determine how relevant the webpage was to their search. An increased “dwell time” will improve your website’s “Page Authority”, which is a key metric that is used to determine your position on a search engine results page.

If you looking for an end-to-end solution for your business needs, look no further. A Nerd’s World can provide you with the best in web design, SEO, headshots, graphics, drone photography, and everything else in between. Give us a call or come visit us in person at our Bathurst Street storefront location for a consultation of our services.

Chris A. Hughes
